review_text: Went and toured this place with 2 of my friends today. Was always throughly pleased and impressed with The Waters when I visited some friends who lived here last year. Rebecca Elliot was extremely kind and very knowledgeable when welcoming us in, presenting leasing options, and giving us a tour of the place. Very excited to be moving in here 2 months from now. Very clean, still has that brand new feel, and a very fresh and welcoming community space. This definitely will be the nicest rental property I’ve ever stayed at. Without a doubt the best apartment space to rent in Hammond, LA.
Beautiful Resort style location staff is 5 star maintenance are always on time. Pool and game room is very enjoyable nice clean always available for use. Love the ability to get Starbucks.

I went on a apartment tour for The Waters at Hammond and had the honor of the exceptional Ms. Kamryn as my tour guide. I had a wonderful experience on my tour and Ms. Kamryn was very helpful in answering all of my questions.

My friend and I were in the search of apartments in the Hammond, Louisiana area and fell in love with the positive and peaceful environment of The Waters at Hammond apartment complex. I am writing this review today because I would like to give a personal shoutout to Ms. Kamryn because she helped us choose The Waters as our new home.

Throughout our time researching the Waters, Ms. Kamryn has always made herself available for questions and concerns. She knew we were new to the apartment searching process and helped us feel more comfortable and at ease. Overall, Ms. Kamryn has done an amazing job helping us and I thank her for her excellent customer service.
Great views and the BEST amenities. Staff is always so helpful and very knowledgeable. love living at this complex.

I have lived here at the waters for two years. The staff go above and beyond. The property is always clean and welcoming. My girls love going for walks around the pond and to the park. The neighbors are wonderful. Sitting on the patio, the passing neighbors always speak. I love that it’s pet friendly. I hate pets inside my apartment but my kids love being on the patio or walking and see others walking their dogs. Chris, Erika, and Charlie feel like extended family. (They are who you meet in the office) Maintenance guys are great ! Any problem big or small they are on the way asap to find and fix the issue.

DO NOT MOVE HERE!!!

Please don’t move here! They will mess your credit history up! They don’t answer the phone and if  they need to contact you Regarding your apartment for any financial reasons they will just send everything to the collection agency! Now I’m dealing with an eviction on my credit after I paid the buy out of the lease. I was never contacted until months later and even then they charged me with the wrong amounts of things that were over charged! I will be getting my lawyer involved because this is unacceptable.

PLEASE DO NOT RENT FROM HERE!

I would highly recommend The Waters at Hammond.  Beautiful property and great staff, from the office to the maintenance crew.  I do visit friends who live there and have enjoyed the pool and gym area many times last year.  The courtesy/police officer on site seems to be on top of her job (from what I have seen and heard).
About the courtesy/police officer (since I’ve seen some bad reviews about her)…
I have witnessed her or her along with staff doing pool checks to make sure people are following the rules/policies of the property.  Two people per apartment seems to be a little strict but at the same time I understand there are over 300 apartments there.  It is good to know there are not a lot of outside people taking up all the space in the amenity areas (like some places may have).  I have spoken to her, and she seems to be as fair as a person can be.  Her motto: “Read your lease, follow the rules and respect your neighbors”.  What more could you ask for?  My friends say that she enforces the rules no matter what your race is and as fair as possible.  So, on the negative comments, I ask myself... Were they following the rules/policies?
About the negative comments, how many people read their lease COMPLETELY?  If they read what they were signing, then they would know the rules/policies of what they can and cannot do.

Very rude courtesy officer. We made a simple mistake of misreading a sign and being in the pool 18 minutes after it closed and the “courtesy officer” barged in through the gate in a robe with no identification yelling at us demanding our unit number and personal information. After explaining it was a human mistake of misreading a sign from not using the pool often she continued yelling and demanding personal information and wasn’t providing any credentials and made us feel very unsafe. She is a very angry individual and regardless of us trying to repeatedly explain it being a human mistake and saying we were leaving immediately she kept yelling and said we “didn’t know how to read”.  it made us feel very unsafe even walking back because we didn’t know if she was following. Verbally insulting tenants for a 18 minute mistake and harassment isn’t necessary. Will not be using this amenity again.

Without a doubt the best apartment space to rent in Hammond, LA.

I don't usually do these kinds of things so excuse me for being a little too excited!

As someone who's lived at not so friendly and accommodating properties in the past, I thought I would never find the right apartment complex to call home :( Well that all changed the second The Waters entered the arena. They blew me away with how friendly the staff was and above all else their commitment to the assurance of safety and comfort that everyone wants in their home.

Anytime I had a problem, a friendly voice was waiting on the other line to help. I almost wish I had more problems just so I can be blown away again by how quickly and efficiently my worries were dissolved.

The amenities are just the cherry on top as well when it comes to the experience at The Waters. The pool is always calling my name like a mermaid singing its song to attract wandering seamen. Unfortunately due to my fear of the ocean, I've never actually swam in the pool but have enjoyed numerous days poolside with friends and fellow neighbors.

I would highly recommend giving this property a chance. Even if it's out of the way, it's worth making the trip. Even if you don't sign a lease, you'll still leave with a smile on your face. We need smiles more than ever in today's world.
I moved in a few weeks ago and just have been blown away. You can tell they really care about their residents!

I recently moved to The Waters at Hammond and have been blown away by my living experience here. The grounds are impeccably maintained, with beautiful landscaping that makes me feel like I'm living in a resort. The staff are friendly and helpful, always available to answer any questions or concerns I have.

But what really sets this apartment complex apart is the maintenance crew. They are top-notch, always quick to respond to any issues and incredibly skilled at what they do. They take great pride in their work, and it shows - my apartment always looks and feels brand new.

Overall, I can't recommend The Waters at Hammond highly enough. If you're looking for a beautiful, well-maintained, and comfortable living experience in Louisiana, this is the place to be.

I have lived at The Waters at Hammond for almost two years. The staff is so helping & caring. The apartment grounds are kept clean & I always feel safe here. A special shout-out to the leasing consultant, Charlie, for always going above and beyond to help our residents! :)

The office goes above and beyond for their residents. They are extremely caring. Anytime I had an issue the maintenance team fixed it promptly (usually within a day). They are extremely dog friendly. I 100% recommend this as your home!!

VISITORS BEWARE!

Early on the morning of April 7th, I had arrived to the Waters to visit some friends after working all night. It was extremely busy in the parking lot with not many available parking spots. I cam up to an area that had a few and backed my truck into the spot. It was a covered section, but I did not think anything of it due to the fact that there were no signs out to inform guests where they can not park. Three hours later, I go to leave and notice my truck is no-where to be found and the office is closed. I had to track down who took my truck and try to understand why. My truck had been taken to Independence, LA. The tow-truck driver told me he has personally walked into the office and told them to put signs out warning people where they can and can not park. He is frequently called out to this complex because it is such a common occurrence. There was no indicator that someone specifically owned this spot.

I called this morning to inquire about some of the rules and regulations of these spots and was informed by Taylor that whoever "owns" this spot can have anyone towed away without the office being involved. She also stated that she thinks they have some signs out but is not sure where they are located. When I spoke to Taylor this afternoon, she blandly stated three times that she understands my frustrations but there is nothing for them to do as if she really did not care.

I have never been towed before because I always check to make sure I am in a safe parking spot where there are no signs warning me otherwise. But this place seems to think everyone is going to automatically know that some select spots are owned by other residents. They absolutely do not care about visitors, and while the property is lovely, I do not care to ever return nor recommend this place to anyone due to poor management.

most amazing location, apts are stunning! I had an amazing time tour with Schmidt and Met some of the other team members who almost feel like family! My Move in was seamless and one of the maintenance guys even helped me get stuff out of my car! been here a little over a month and I could not be happier! Love it Here

My experience living at The Waters has been wonderful. The property is well maintained and the staff is always friendly. I’m thankful for Schmidt in the front office because she went the extra mile to make sure this place would be everything I wanted! Love my home.

I’ve lived here for 8 months now and I love it. Everything is beautiful and clean and the front office staff are super friendly and helpful. Ms. Schmidt is the one who toured me and she couldn’t have been more helpful… helped me find the perfect apartment! I absolutely love living here, and parking has been a breeze. I would highly recommend this complex.
Hands down the nicest, best kept grounds I’ve seen at an apartment complex! Very clean and welcoming. Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. Can’t recommend The Waters enough!

My experience living at The Waters has been amazing. The property is always gorgeous. The fact that there is a carwash here is so convenient. I’m so grateful for Schmidt in the front office. She went above and beyond, and I couldn’t be more happy with my home.

Place is very nice and the workers are excellent especially Charlie farmer I highly suggest requesting him! He helped me get an apartment so fast.. his work effort is amazing. Charlie is the best and most professional person highly recommend getting an apartment here!!

The waters, are the most beautifully decorated apartment complex I’ve ever come across! And the staff was even more amazing and accommodating especially with all my questions! Luke Bentivegna was the one who REALLY stood out to me he was very understanding and was super confident in his answers and reassurance of the knowledge of the building and the residents due to my past experiences else where! Keep up the great job you guys 🥰

The staff at The Waters has absolutely amazing customer service! Everyone here is eager & happy to help you! The complex is very clean and had a welcoming & cozy atmosphere. Definitely looking forward to living here!
These balconies offer breathtaking views to Watch the Sunrise!

This place is just okay. When I first moved in everyone was overly nice and attentive & communicative, but now since I’ve moved in, they are impossible to reach, never answer the phone, do not call you back, never respond to emails, which is all extremely unprofessional. People park in my designated spot which I have to pay for monthly, the gates are always broken and unauthorized people enter in which causes issues. Management procrastinates and you have to constantly call them for weeks to get a response. Now the valet trash is a huge issue, they outsource it & find the cheapest company who skip your unit never pick up your trash & the residents are STILL charged $50 fees even if it wasn’t your fault the people skipped your unit. Even though residents complain about this (and management even admitted they receive several complaints) nothing is done. Valet trash is not optional, you have to pay for it, even if they don't pick it up. This is a total waste of money. And, they don’t waive the $50 fee on your account regardless of how many times you call to get it resolved. They are completely unprofessional!  Do not move here, there are other places that are much more affordable & worth it. 2,000/month is not worth all of this.
The Waters at Hammond is such a beautiful property! The office staff are always kind and the maintenance team response in a timely manner. We love them!

This was the most beautiful property I’ve ever stopped by. Not only was it gorgeous but staff were professional and courteous. They made me feel welcomed and cared for. I toured and snacks were provided. I unfortunately couldn’t rent due to a last minute relocation but this place would be anyones dream home!

I wish I could give this place zero stars. The leasing consultants are awful. They are unprofessional, lack problem solving skills, and are non-communicative.  I have never experienced such nasty customer service.

Perfect location and team provides top notch service. The maintenance team was always on top of any issues, which we rarely had.  The management team has been very kind, and we are sad to leave, but we are relocating for work.  We recently had the opportunity to meet a new team member, Chris M, who was a pleasure getting to know.  THANK YOU!

The staff is VERY friendly, very professional and answer any questions you may have.  I can not wait to be apart of this community (couple more weeks).  The property is very beautiful considering it is still under construction. They have done a great job at keeping construction separate from the community that is finished.
Great job!!!

Brand new and the management is amazing! Very friendly and always willing to help the best way they possibly can! The property is beautiful and well maintained. Maintenance is top notch and have great work ethic and personality!

The Waters at Hammond is absolutely beautiful. All of the staff members are wonderful. The Waters at Hammond does a great job addressing the needs and concerns of all of the tenants in a very timely manner.
The staff here are excellent. They really seem to care about the customer's needs and are very accommodating. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy apartment.

love living here. clean, staff is amazing and Schmidt who toured me never steered me wrong and helped me find the perfect apt!! Just love living here and parking has been a breeze! Thanks again so much!

I loved the brand new apartments! Very well maintained and nice amenities. One of the staff members named Luke showed me around, he was polite and very professional. I would recommend these beautiful apartments to anyone.
I loved the pool and it was amazing to have so many community events, Charlie was fun to talk too and super helpful! I look forward to applying to the Lafayette location whenever it’s finished!

The Water's is not just an apartment complex, it is a nice little community. When my life was turned upside down, they went above and beyond to help me get into an apartment fast. Dawson, Schmidt, and Charlie are absolutely the best. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you.

I highly recommend the Water's if you are looking for a place to call home.
Amazing place overall! The staff, neighbors, community. Would highly recommend this as your next home. Met some of the best people here!
I visited The Waters in Hammond & was immediately impressed with the outdoor maintenance. The apartments were roomy, updated & fabulous & even spoke to a couple of friendly staffers.

This is the nicest apartment complex I have ever lived in. I truly forget that I am not in a house. The staff is great, and the grounds are kept up so beautifully.  I’m so happy I can call The Water home!!

Our home is the best. I have lived in many apartments but this place out shines them all. The office staff is always willing to answer all my questions and address any concerns I have. I would give this a 10 if I could! We are not leaving anytime soon.
The waters at hammond is a beautiful community. I’m so grateful that Schmidt was able to give a great tour and help me find the best home. She was so kind and considerate!
I love the staff at the Waters! Shoutout to Charlie at the front desk who went above and beyond and was incredibly sweet,  friendly and accommodating!!
I HIGHLY recommend The Waters! Staff is OUTSTANDING always with great service in a timely manner.  My personal favorite are all the amenities on site!

The property is super nice and the staff responded quickly when I inquired about leasing. Nice girl named Schmidty gave me a tour and answered every question I could think of. Definitely consider this place as your next home.

I am disappointed at the inhumane, callous way the “community” manager and the property director handled a repeated plumbing issue.  Raw sewage backed up into the apartment 4 times in 3 weeks.  Maintenance poured bleach on the feces in the tub.  Plumbers removed a blue cap that they stated was left during construction.  She asked for November rent to be waived and for them to replace her contaminated belongings . They told her they would give $500 off “in good faith”  and to use her renters insurance Bc  “that’s what it’s for”. They refuse to take responsibility, and the disregard for human life is 1000 times more disgusting than the feces that was piled in the tub!!!

the waters at hammond has been the best complex overall that i’ve lived at. from the management, to the pool, the community events & even the quick maintenance… i would recommend living here for anyone who is even considering the waters!!
The Waters is a very nice place to live. Great amenities, good community, and many perks onsite such as car wash and pet wash station!

These apartments are beautiful!!!!  Lots of amenities that make this place a wonderful place to live.  Starbucks coffee, gym, pool!!  😍 Also the staff is amazing... willing to go far and beyond to make the process easy.
The Waters is a beautiful complex! The staff are so pleasant and Mr. Mitch Magyar is very attentive and helpful.
My best friends son Luke Bentivegna lives and works here.  He showed me around and all I can say is this place is beautiful!! Keep up the good work!!!
The best apartment complex in Hammond, Louisiana! 🏰✨ I always go there for the free car wash! 🚗 #Hammond #Louisiana #FreeCarWash
Beautiful property, great amenities, friendly staff and residents. Love the gatherings that help connect with our neighbors. Great location, lots of restaurants and shopping near by.

I loved the apartment complex my mother-in-law lives in thought she was very safe and happy until yesterday..as we went to visit and spend family time with her ..as we were so embarrassed by the police woman to ask to leave..and take a BBQ inside..was not appropriate..I know complexes have their rules and regulations but it was only about 8 people but the police officer said you can only have 2 guests per household that's crazy..And aslo we ask her about others that were out there .but we were the only ones that had to leave..bad business.. and I also know a couple of people that live there that have a two-bedroom apartment with 5 people living in it.. so what about their guests ..5 people/2.. guests per person.. really..
I have just recently moved her and it was unbelievable how helpful the staff was and how beautiful the place is. The apartment is amazing and all that come with it is unmatched
Well kept property and staff was extremely helpful. We decided to buy instead of renting again. Definitely recommend.
Looking to move south. Checked out this very beautiful property! Christopher the leasing agent answered any questions or concerns we had. He was very informative and professional.
This place is amazing!! Absolutely nice staff here and are always making sure if we need anything. Love it here and hope other people do too!
Very wonderful place, loved the layouts of the bedrooms. The lady who gave me a tour was named Schmidt very sweet, very knowledgeable. I think this would be a wonderful place for me and my friend.
I would highly recommend the complex. The pool, the clubhouse, the grounds and the parking we're all well kept. I very much look forward to using the pool as the weather warms up.
Beautiful property,  maintenance was quick. Overall well run complex. Love the monthly events and swag!
Yeah I love the maintenance at the waters Hammond everything is clean up the date very nice the manager Mitchell is very kind
The Waters in Hammond is a very beautiful place. Very well maintained and the yards are cleaned. This is definitely the best place to rent in Hammond.

Loved the property! That Chris Magboo fellow really helped us out. He made the whole search process go over very smoothly.
Love the apartments! I walked into the leasing office and felt so invited by the leasing team. Dawson and Schmidt answered all my questions that I had and I can’t wait to live here!
The waters at Hammond is a great property! The staff is friendly and maintenance requests get taken care of quickly and efficiently!
I have enjoyed living here so much! They have the best amenities I have ever seen at any apartment complex in Hammond and the apartments are stunning!
Very hospitable and accommodating staff. Clean space with a great pool area and game room!
Very nice  apartment complex buildings, very nice community with many amenities to offer. Looking forward to explore everything it offers. Thank you!
The whole process went smooth and the waters team at the Hammond location was very nice and helpful. They made me feel welcomed.
I love the community, the staff, and my favorite amenity is the pool table in the 24/7 gameroom! 10/10 would recommend!
Looking for a place and can’t wait to see this one. The place seems so clean and well maintained…I love the swimming pool… see you soon!
The place looks great! I would love to live there just by the picture!
Beautiful property and outstanding staff.  Easy access to surrounding businesses and Downtown Hammond.  Overall great location and staff!
Amazing staff maintenance is always quick to respond and the office staff are all super nice best complex I've lived in

VERY PREJUDICE!!!!! I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APARTMENT COMPLEX TO MY WORST ENEMY! THE VERY OWN “PROTECTION” THAT IS SUPPOSED TO HAVE TENANTS WELL BEING THEIR TOP PRIORITY, OR THE PATROL POLICE ON DUTY, IS A RAGING STALKER AND WILL NOT LEAVE ME ALONE. I HAVE HAD MULTIPLE ENCOUNTERS IN WHICH SHE HAS VIDEO RECORDED MY UNIT AND ACCUSED ME OF HORRENDOUS ACTS THAT HAVE BEEN PROVEN UNTRUE. SHE HAS TAKEN PICTURES OF MY GUEST AGAINST THEIR WILL ALONG WITH PICTURES OF THEIR VEHICLES. ALSO, SHE HAS BEEN CAUGHT TAKING PICTURES INSIDE OF MY GUEST’S VEHICLES. THE APARTMENT COMPLEX’S MANAGER IS VERY RUDE. SHE REFERS TO PEOPLE WITH SUCH A DISGUSTING ATTITUDE AND NO REMORSE FOR HUMAN DECENCY AND RESPECT. 0/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

Nicest apartments I have ever lived in. Everyone is extremely helpful and friendly!

The staff is courteous and helpful. The complex is well maintained and beautiful.
Great place to call home... even if for a short time! Staff and crew go over and above.  Will be forever grateful to them all.
I love that this property is gated and has a courtesy officer! Dawson was amazing! So polite & respectful.
Very well maintained and everything has been extremely smooth so far!  Love it!
Beautiful complex. Lovely amenities. Everything you want in an apartment. I wish I could afford to live there.
The staff was so knowledgeable and attentive on my tour. Beautiful complex and right next to Hammond Square!
Chris is the man! Extremely helpful through the entire leasing process, and just a great guy all the way around!
Beautiful property and Christopher was an amazing tour guide!! Can’t wait to move in

Went and toured this place with 2 of my friends today. Was always throughly pleased and impressed with The Waters when I visited some friends who lived here last year. Rebecca Elliot was extremely kind and very knowledgeable when welcoming us in, presenting leasing options, and giving us a tour of the place. Very excited to be moving in here 2 months from now. Very clean, still has that brand new feel, and a very fresh and welcoming community space. This definitely will be the nicest rental property I’ve ever stayed at. Without a doubt the best apartment space to rent in Hammond, LA.
Beautiful Resort style location staff is 5 star maintenance are always on time. Pool and game room is very enjoyable nice clean always available for use. Love the ability to get Starbucks.

I went on a apartment tour for The Waters at Hammond and had the honor of the exceptional Ms. Kamryn as my tour guide. I had a wonderful experience on my tour and Ms. Kamryn was very helpful in answering all of my questions.

My friend and I were in the search of apartments in the Hammond, Louisiana area and fell in love with the positive and peaceful environment of The Waters at Hammond apartment complex. I am writing this review today because I would like to give a personal shoutout to Ms. Kamryn because she helped us choose The Waters as our new home.

Throughout our time researching the Waters, Ms. Kamryn has always made herself available for questions and concerns. She knew we were new to the apartment searching process and helped us feel more comfortable and at ease. Overall, Ms. Kamryn has done an amazing job helping us and I thank her for her excellent customer service.
Great views and the BEST amenities. Staff is always so helpful and very knowledgeable. love living at this complex.

I have lived here at the waters for two years. The staff go above and beyond. The property is always clean and welcoming. My girls love going for walks around the pond and to the park. The neighbors are wonderful. Sitting on the patio, the passing neighbors always speak. I love that it’s pet friendly. I hate pets inside my apartment but my kids love being on the patio or walking and see others walking their dogs. Chris, Erika, and Charlie feel like extended family. (They are who you meet in the office) Maintenance guys are great ! Any problem big or small they are on the way asap to find and fix the issue.

DO NOT MOVE HERE!!!

Please don’t move here! They will mess your credit history up! They don’t answer the phone and if  they need to contact you Regarding your apartment for any financial reasons they will just send everything to the collection agency! Now I’m dealing with an eviction on my credit after I paid the buy out of the lease. I was never contacted until months later and even then they charged me with the wrong amounts of things that were over charged! I will be getting my lawyer involved because this is unacceptable.

PLEASE DO NOT RENT FROM HERE!

I would highly recommend The Waters at Hammond.  Beautiful property and great staff, from the office to the maintenance crew.  I do visit friends who live there and have enjoyed the pool and gym area many times last year.  The courtesy/police officer on site seems to be on top of her job (from what I have seen and heard).
About the courtesy/police officer (since I’ve seen some bad reviews about her)…
I have witnessed her or her along with staff doing pool checks to make sure people are following the rules/policies of the property.  Two people per apartment seems to be a little strict but at the same time I understand there are over 300 apartments there.  It is good to know there are not a lot of outside people taking up all the space in the amenity areas (like some places may have).  I have spoken to her, and she seems to be as fair as a person can be.  Her motto: “Read your lease, follow the rules and respect your neighbors”.  What more could you ask for?  My friends say that she enforces the rules no matter what your race is and as fair as possible.  So, on the negative comments, I ask myself... Were they following the rules/policies?
About the negative comments, how many people read their lease COMPLETELY?  If they read what they were signing, then they would know the rules/policies of what they can and cannot do.

Very rude courtesy officer. We made a simple mistake of misreading a sign and being in the pool 18 minutes after it closed and the “courtesy officer” barged in through the gate in a robe with no identification yelling at us demanding our unit number and personal information. After explaining it was a human mistake of misreading a sign from not using the pool often she continued yelling and demanding personal information and wasn’t providing any credentials and made us feel very unsafe. She is a very angry individual and regardless of us trying to repeatedly explain it being a human mistake and saying we were leaving immediately she kept yelling and said we “didn’t know how to read”.  it made us feel very unsafe even walking back because we didn’t know if she was following. Verbally insulting tenants for a 18 minute mistake and harassment isn’t necessary. Will not be using this amenity again.

I don't usually do these kinds of things so excuse me for being a little too excited!

As someone who's lived at not so friendly and accommodating properties in the past, I thought I would never find the right apartment complex to call home :( Well that all changed the second The Waters entered the arena. They blew me away with how friendly the staff was and above all else their commitment to the assurance of safety and comfort that everyone wants in their home.

Anytime I had a problem, a friendly voice was waiting on the other line to help. I almost wish I had more problems just so I can be blown away again by how quickly and efficiently my worries were dissolved.

The amenities are just the cherry on top as well when it comes to the experience at The Waters. The pool is always calling my name like a mermaid singing its song to attract wandering seamen. Unfortunately due to my fear of the ocean, I've never actually swam in the pool but have enjoyed numerous days poolside with friends and fellow neighbors.

I would highly recommend giving this property a chance. Even if it's out of the way, it's worth making the trip. Even if you don't sign a lease, you'll still leave with a smile on your face. We need smiles more than ever in today's world.
I moved in a few weeks ago and just have been blown away. You can tell they really care about their residents!

I recently moved to The Waters at Hammond and have been blown away by my living experience here. The grounds are impeccably maintained, with beautiful landscaping that makes me feel like I'm living in a resort. The staff are friendly and helpful, always available to answer any questions or concerns I have.

But what really sets this apartment complex apart is the maintenance crew. They are top-notch, always quick to respond to any issues and incredibly skilled at what they do. They take great pride in their work, and it shows - my apartment always looks and feels brand new.

Overall, I can't recommend The Waters at Hammond highly enough. If you're looking for a beautiful, well-maintained, and comfortable living experience in Louisiana, this is the place to be.

I have lived at The Waters at Hammond for almost two years. The staff is so helping & caring. The apartment grounds are kept clean & I always feel safe here. A special shout-out to the leasing consultant, Charlie, for always going above and beyond to help our residents! :)

The office goes above and beyond for their residents. They are extremely caring. Anytime I had an issue the maintenance team fixed it promptly (usually within a day). They are extremely dog friendly. I 100% recommend this as your home!!

VISITORS BEWARE!

Early on the morning of April 7th, I had arrived to the Waters to visit some friends after working all night. It was extremely busy in the parking lot with not many available parking spots. I cam up to an area that had a few and backed my truck into the spot. It was a covered section, but I did not think anything of it due to the fact that there were no signs out to inform guests where they can not park. Three hours later, I go to leave and notice my truck is no-where to be found and the office is closed. I had to track down who took my truck and try to understand why. My truck had been taken to Independence, LA. The tow-truck driver told me he has personally walked into the office and told them to put signs out warning people where they can and can not park. He is frequently called out to this complex because it is such a common occurrence. There was no indicator that someone specifically owned this spot.

I called this morning to inquire about some of the rules and regulations of these spots and was informed by Taylor that whoever "owns" this spot can have anyone towed away without the office being involved. She also stated that she thinks they have some signs out but is not sure where they are located. When I spoke to Taylor this afternoon, she blandly stated three times that she understands my frustrations but there is nothing for them to do as if she really did not care.

I have never been towed before because I always check to make sure I am in a safe parking spot where there are no signs warning me otherwise. But this place seems to think everyone is going to automatically know that some select spots are owned by other residents. They absolutely do not care about visitors, and while the property is lovely, I do not care to ever return nor recommend this place to anyone due to poor management.

most amazing location, apts are stunning! I had an amazing time tour with Schmidt and Met some of the other team members who almost feel like family! My Move in was seamless and one of the maintenance guys even helped me get stuff out of my car! been here a little over a month and I could not be happier! Love it Here

My experience living at The Waters has been wonderful. The property is well maintained and the staff is always friendly. I’m thankful for Schmidt in the front office because she went the extra mile to make sure this place would be everything I wanted! Love my home.

I’ve lived here for 8 months now and I love it. Everything is beautiful and clean and the front office staff are super friendly and helpful. Ms. Schmidt is the one who toured me and she couldn’t have been more helpful… helped me find the perfect apartment! I absolutely love living here, and parking has been a breeze. I would highly recommend this complex.
Hands down the nicest, best kept grounds I’ve seen at an apartment complex! Very clean and welcoming. Staff are incredibly friendly and helpful. Can’t recommend The Waters enough!

My experience living at The Waters has been amazing. The property is always gorgeous. The fact that there is a carwash here is so convenient. I’m so grateful for Schmidt in the front office. She went above and beyond, and I couldn’t be more happy with my home.

Place is very nice and the workers are excellent especially Charlie farmer I highly suggest requesting him! He helped me get an apartment so fast.. his work effort is amazing. Charlie is the best and most professional person highly recommend getting an apartment here!!

The waters, are the most beautifully decorated apartment complex I’ve ever come across! And the staff was even more amazing and accommodating especially with all my questions! Luke Bentivegna was the one who REALLY stood out to me he was very understanding and was super confident in his answers and reassurance of the knowledge of the building and the residents due to my past experiences else where! Keep up the great job you guys 🥰

The staff at The Waters has absolutely amazing customer service! Everyone here is eager & happy to help you! The complex is very clean and had a welcoming & cozy atmosphere. Definitely looking forward to living here!
These balconies offer breathtaking views to Watch the Sunrise!

This place is just okay. When I first moved in everyone was overly nice and attentive & communicative, but now since I’ve moved in, they are impossible to reach, never answer the phone, do not call you back, never respond to emails, which is all extremely unprofessional. People park in my designated spot which I have to pay for monthly, the gates are always broken and unauthorized people enter in which causes issues. Management procrastinates and you have to constantly call them for weeks to get a response. Now the valet trash is a huge issue, they outsource it & find the cheapest company who skip your unit never pick up your trash & the residents are STILL charged $50 fees even if it wasn’t your fault the people skipped your unit. Even though residents complain about this (and management even admitted they receive several complaints) nothing is done. Valet trash is not optional, you have to pay for it, even if they don't pick it up. This is a total waste of money. And, they don’t waive the $50 fee on your account regardless of how many times you call to get it resolved. They are completely unprofessional!  Do not move here, there are other places that are much more affordable & worth it. 2,000/month is not worth all of this.
The Waters at Hammond is such a beautiful property! The office staff are always kind and the maintenance team response in a timely manner. We love them!

This was the most beautiful property I’ve ever stopped by. Not only was it gorgeous but staff were professional and courteous. They made me feel welcomed and cared for. I toured and snacks were provided. I unfortunately couldn’t rent due to a last minute relocation but this place would be anyones dream home!

I wish I could give this place zero stars. The leasing consultants are awful. They are unprofessional, lack problem solving skills, and are non-communicative.  I have never experienced such nasty customer service.

Perfect location and team provides top notch service. The maintenance team was always on top of any issues, which we rarely had.  The management team has been very kind, and we are sad to leave, but we are relocating for work.  We recently had the opportunity to meet a new team member, Chris M, who was a pleasure getting to know.  THANK YOU!

The staff is VERY friendly, very professional and answer any questions you may have.  I can not wait to be apart of this community (couple more weeks).  The property is very beautiful considering it is still under construction. They have done a great job at keeping construction separate from the community that is finished.
Great job!!!

Brand new and the management is amazing! Very friendly and always willing to help the best way they possibly can! The property is beautiful and well maintained. Maintenance is top notch and have great work ethic and personality!

The Waters at Hammond is absolutely beautiful. All of the staff members are wonderful. The Waters at Hammond does a great job addressing the needs and concerns of all of the tenants in a very timely manner.
The staff here are excellent. They really seem to care about the customer's needs and are very accommodating. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy apartment.

love living here. clean, staff is amazing and Schmidt who toured me never steered me wrong and helped me find the perfect apt!! Just love living here and parking has been a breeze! Thanks again so much!

I loved the brand new apartments! Very well maintained and nice amenities. One of the staff members named Luke showed me around, he was polite and very professional. I would recommend these beautiful apartments to anyone.
I loved the pool and it was amazing to have so many community events, Charlie was fun to talk too and super helpful! I look forward to applying to the Lafayette location whenever it’s finished!

The Water's is not just an apartment complex, it is a nice little community. When my life was turned upside down, they went above and beyond to help me get into an apartment fast. Dawson, Schmidt, and Charlie are absolutely the best. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you.

I highly recommend the Water's if you are looking for a place to call home.
Amazing place overall! The staff, neighbors, community. Would highly recommend this as your next home. Met some of the best people here!
I visited The Waters in Hammond & was immediately impressed with the outdoor maintenance. The apartments were roomy, updated & fabulous & even spoke to a couple of friendly staffers.

This is the nicest apartment complex I have ever lived in. I truly forget that I am not in a house. The staff is great, and the grounds are kept up so beautifully.  I’m so happy I can call The Water home!!

Our home is the best. I have lived in many apartments but this place out shines them all. The office staff is always willing to answer all my questions and address any concerns I have. I would give this a 10 if I could! We are not leaving anytime soon.
The waters at hammond is a beautiful community. I’m so grateful that Schmidt was able to give a great tour and help me find the best home. She was so kind and considerate!
I love the staff at the Waters! Shoutout to Charlie at the front desk who went above and beyond and was incredibly sweet,  friendly and accommodating!!
I HIGHLY recommend The Waters! Staff is OUTSTANDING always with great service in a timely manner.  My personal favorite are all the amenities on site!

The property is super nice and the staff responded quickly when I inquired about leasing. Nice girl named Schmidty gave me a tour and answered every question I could think of. Definitely consider this place as your next home.

I am disappointed at the inhumane, callous way the “community” manager and the property director handled a repeated plumbing issue.  Raw sewage backed up into the apartment 4 times in 3 weeks.  Maintenance poured bleach on the feces in the tub.  Plumbers removed a blue cap that they stated was left during construction.  She asked for November rent to be waived and for them to replace her contaminated belongings . They told her they would give $500 off “in good faith”  and to use her renters insurance Bc  “that’s what it’s for”. They refuse to take responsibility, and the disregard for human life is 1000 times more disgusting than the feces that was piled in the tub!!!

the waters at hammond has been the best complex overall that i’ve lived at. from the management, to the pool, the community events & even the quick maintenance… i would recommend living here for anyone who is even considering the waters!!
The Waters is a very nice place to live. Great amenities, good community, and many perks onsite such as car wash and pet wash station!

These apartments are beautiful!!!!  Lots of amenities that make this place a wonderful place to live.  Starbucks coffee, gym, pool!!  😍 Also the staff is amazing... willing to go far and beyond to make the process easy.
The Waters is a beautiful complex! The staff are so pleasant and Mr. Mitch Magyar is very attentive and helpful.
My best friends son Luke Bentivegna lives and works here.  He showed me around and all I can say is this place is beautiful!! Keep up the good work!!!
The best apartment complex in Hammond, Louisiana! 🏰✨ I always go there for the free car wash! 🚗 #Hammond #Louisiana #FreeCarWash

I have just recently moved her and it was unbelievable how helpful the staff was and how beautiful the place is. The apartment is amazing and all that come with it is unmatched
Well kept property and staff was extremely helpful. We decided to buy instead of renting again. Definitely recommend.
Looking to move south. Checked out this very beautiful property! Christopher the leasing agent answered any questions or concerns we had. He was very informative and professional.
This place is amazing!! Absolutely nice staff here and are always making sure if we need anything. Love it here and hope other people do too!
Very wonderful place, loved the layouts of the bedrooms. The lady who gave me a tour was named Schmidt very sweet, very knowledgeable. I think this would be a wonderful place for me and my friend.
I would highly recommend the complex. The pool, the clubhouse, the grounds and the parking we're all well kept. I very much look forward to using the pool as the weather warms up.
Beautiful property,  maintenance was quick. Overall well run complex. Love the monthly events and swag!
Yeah I love the maintenance at the waters Hammond everything is clean up the date very nice the manager Mitchell is very kind
The Waters in Hammond is a very beautiful place. Very well maintained and the yards are cleaned. This is definitely the best place to rent in Hammond.
Visited friends here and loved the floor plans.  Wonderful amenities and beautiful finishes in the apartment.  ⭐️
Loved the property! That Chris Magboo fellow really helped us out. He made the whole search process go over very smoothly.
Love the apartments! I walked into the leasing office and felt so invited by the leasing team. Dawson and Schmidt answered all my questions that I had and I can’t wait to live here!
The waters at Hammond is a great property! The staff is friendly and maintenance requests get taken care of quickly and efficiently!
